Question: In August 2012 Nemtsov listed 20 villas and palaces, 9 of which were built during this person's 12 years in power.
Hints: Currently, this person holds a 6th dan (red/white belt) and is best known for his Harai Goshi (sweeping hip throw).
Though his father was a "militant atheist", this person's mother "was a devoted Orthodox believer".
This person was inaugurated president on 7 May 2000.
